Flub.Name: Profile
Flub.Description: The different types of crater styles.

Flub.Name: Craterfield
Flub.Description: Creates a craterfield which has combination of small and large craters.

Flub.Name: Depth
Flub.Description: Depth of the impact. Lowering the depth also elevates the surrounding ground level.

Flub.Name: Density
Flub.Description: Density of craters in the craterfield.

Flub.Name: Floor
Flub.Description: The altitude of the crater floor.

Flub.Name: Depth
Flub.Description: Depth of the impact. Lowering the depth also elevates the surrounding ground level.

Flub.Name: Outer Scale
Flub.Description: The scale of the outer elevated wall of the impact zone.

Flub.Name: Inner Scale
Flub.Description: The scale of the inside of the impact zone.

Flub.Name: Modulate
Flub.Description: Modulate the distribution between the ground, walls, and floor of the crater zone.

Flub.Name: Lip
Flub.Description: Creates a transition wall or "lip" between the inside and outside of the impact zone.

Flub.Name: Seed
Flub.Description: The randomization pattern or seed for the node's process.
